resources.string:
Welcome to our SMS message analysis application! Our goal is to help you easily identify and address hate speech in your text messages.
Our machine learning algorithm analyzes your messages to determine if they contain any hateful language, and provides you with actionable insights to help you improve your communication with others.

By using our SMS message analysis application, you agree to the following terms and conditions Our app may collect certain information about you and your use of the app. By using our app, you consent to our collection and use of this information. By using our app, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms and conditions, do not use our app.
